reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and thought-provoking assignments. Highly recommended!

reviews.review: Brilliant instructor. Makes complex concepts easy to understand.

reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but lectures can be dry at times.

reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Martinez explains concepts clearly.

reviews.review: Interesting topics, but sometimes hard to follow.

reviews.review: Complex subject made accessible. Great lab sessions.
